title: Healthcare Practical Skill Enhancement: Play-Based Instructional Design for Early Childhood Design Thinking Development

context.prior_knowledge: Core knowledge of secondary science education and foundational understanding of design thinking
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The principles of designing play-based design thinking activities for young children can be explained.
Microlearning materials suitable for mobile environments can be used to analyze young children's design thinking development stages.
Formative assessment methods can be proposed to measure the effectiveness of design thinking education activities for young children.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
